feros khan, mithun chakrabhothi, nasrudin sha, jaki sherof, sanje dath, anil kapur, sani diyol, hema malini, jaya bachchan, raki, shabana aasmi, sinath aman, parwin babi, rekha, dimipal kapadiya, yana rangana shilpihu athare peramuna gena sitiyaha, me yugaye sinamawa karmanthayak lesa pawathwa genayama sandaha satan, premaya, sangithaya, kamaya, wikata wani sakala widhi prayoga bhawitha kirimata ehi nishpadakayanta siduwuye me wana wita pawathi kalu-sudu warnayata simawi thibu indiya rupawahiniya siya asal wasiya wana shri lankawa warna rupawahiniyata yomuwimath samanga niwasata kotuwi sitina sinama rasikaya rupawahini prekshakayeku bawata path nokara sinamahal kara adi ena prekshakayeku lesa sinamahalata kandawa ganimata awashya wu bawini.
